title: holydarkness
author: holydarkness
content: What happened: Plagiarizing whitepaperSuspect's Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3449501Suspect's Website: http://www.finoxocoin.io/ | archivedSuspect's ANN thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400517.0 | archivedSuspect's litepaper: https://www.finoxocoin.io/litepaper_FINOXO%20linked.pdf | archivedPlagiarized Documents:At least these three:[1] https://coinguides.org/bep2-bep20-erc20-the-difference/[2] https://www.smartmoneymatch.com/articles/A-Complete-Understanding-Of-The-Tron-%28TRC-20%29-Token-Development-Process/3932#:~:text=A%20TRC%2D20%20token%20is,of%20the%20TRON%20virtual%20machine.[3] https://cryptopotato.com/what-is-solana/Additional Notes:Given their litepaper is mostly images and graphs, it is not exaggerating to say that word-to-page ratio wise, their litepaper is heavily plagiarized. Even their abstract is "outsourced", although the original website seems to be already offline [see image 4 for this] Some screenshot for easy view: [1] [2] [3] [4] Notifying the suspect.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: If they were to add source links, I won't call them plagiarism here. Because all the definitions like Solana or Binance smart chain are the same. We can't change it anyway. But likely we can write is ourselves for a better experience. But whole the theme is the same and we can't change any part. They did a mistake by not adding the sources. Yea, likely they will come here with the same excuse and will blame their writers. That will prove the team's irreversibility.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: The Cryptovator on May 30, 2022, 06:09:02 PMIf they were to add source links, I won't call them plagiarism here. Because all the definitions like Solana or Binance smart chain are the same. We can't change it anyway. But likely we can write is ourselves for a better experience. But whole the theme is the same and we can't change any part. They did a mistake by not adding the sources. Yea, likely they will come here with the same excuse and will blame their writers. That will prove the team's irreversibility.The same thought crossed my mind when I strolled through their litepaper and crosschecking them with the plagiarism checker, that if only they added bibliography on their last page, their action will be justified --I even checked their last page to see if they did this, which unfortunately they didn't. Nonetheless, the plagiarism of abstract can hardly be acceptable. Copying definition --with proper citation-- and description of things from existing media is acceptable, copying an abstract, though, is something that's entirely different.
